title: Nuptial invite font ID
content:
It’s something generic from a party invite company, but I’m drawing a blank. Any thoughts?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112334im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/scan0001_4454.jpg)

 [‹ Any ideas?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112334/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39459 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help Id Decorative Fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112334/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39460 "Go to next forum topic")
author: northbynorthwest

comments.content:
[Stuyvesant](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112334/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/bitstream/stuyvesant_regular/?sample_text=The%20pleasure%20of%20your%20company%20is%20requested%20at&sample_size=36&acs_ss=-1&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1)
